frozen.name: libirecovery
frozen.shortDescription: Library and utility to talk to iBoot/iBSS via USB on Mac OS X, Windows, and Linux
frozen.longDescription:
libirecovery is a cross-platform library which implements communication to
iBoot/iBSS found on Apple's iOS devices via USB. A command-line utility is also
provided.

license.fullName: GNU Lesser General Public License v2.1 only
